author: hayde
title: hayde
text:
you made my day! i was trying to purchase a ticket sense Friday , my credit card was not taking from other companies , always was something going on, I lost the special that Delta air line had, i was totally depress, but today i went to my emails and had this special going on and i said to my self . this is another " ", but I try any ways Surprise everything went fine my credit car was good and y purchase my ticket with not problems and little less expensive!
thnaks
